channel.title: Starting Runescape
channel.description:
I started playing Runescape, again, yesterday. I need some tips on what to do with the highly upgraded Runescape; I haven't play since 2007. A lot has changed, and I don't know what I should do. Any tips? Any free items to help me out with my new account?
Thanks. <3

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Speljohan:

Ignore the children. The game has almost exclusively improved for the past few years (with a few exceptions). Overall it is better now than it was before.

This^

Read full topic

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Ignore the children. The game has almost exclusively improved for the past few years (with a few exceptions). Overall it is better now than it was before.

item.description:
@DELOCH wrote:

Every single client on this site is better than runescape. Even the ones with viruses.

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:2, topic:438869”]here’s a tip:
log off and never return to that website again.[/quote]

[quote=“RandQm, post:6, topic:438869”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=541577.msg3967404#msg3967404 date=1333846560]
yeah rs isn’t worth it just leave the site, clear your browser history and have a cup of tea.
[/quote][/quote][quote=“JavaTC, post:18, topic:438869”][quote author=t4 link=topic=541577.msg3967847#msg3967847 date=1333898631]
quit whilst you still can
[/quote]I’d agree with this[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

The game is very rich in content now and there’s a lot of things to do. As mentioned above, you could look up some lately uploaded YouTube videos of stuff or just explore the new RS.

Unfortunately you may not like today’s community like in 2007 but it’s still playable.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ciaran6889, post:16, topic:438869”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=541577.msg3967788#msg3967788 date=1333893517]

epicbot is horrible

EpicBot is amazing, I’ve used that thing for EVERYTHING besides the auto-fighter script, I haven’t tested it.
[/quote] everyone says its safe but it definitely hacked me before[/quote]
Don’t save the passwords, use a fake password.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

t4:

quit whilst you still can

It’s quite easy to quit now that it has turned into pile of crap. But I must admit, I couldn’t quit RS for years, I started playing at year 2002, and played till 2008’s, but I had half year breaks every now and then.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @dsdodson95 dsdodson95
item.description:
@dsdodson95 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:10, topic:438869”][quote author=dsdodson95 link=topic=541577.msg3967645#msg3967645 date=1333865944]

Slayer is great.

This, but it all comes down to how you originally played the game. Get back into some things you enjoyed when you used to play and ease into the new content.

Also I <3 Dungeoneering, would recommend it

Well, I had to create a new account.
Want to help me out, sir?
[/quote]

With?[/quote]

Anything, really.

[quote=“ciaran6889, post:11, topic:438869”]this is what you do:
1.wait 3-5days hoping that pbot will update there bot
2.bot 24/7 making mills and while your botting start merching and if youre botting at the ge u can flip aswell[/quote]

EpicBot works.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Best tip ever: Turn your public off
People don’t know about half the shit they’re saying in that game

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

Slayer is great.

This, but it all comes down to how you originally played the game. Get back into some things you enjoyed when you used to play and ease into the new content.

Also I <3 Dungeoneering, would recommend it

log off and never return to that website again.[/quote]
He said he is starting RuneScape again, not asking for people to spam his thread to post stupid answers.

OT: You could look up some of the YouTube videos for RuneScape. Slayer is something to go with for the time being though as said above.
